TemporalDirections.TEXT: 119,GEORGE,A decent hotel-room...,1.0,S01E01,1.0 120,JERRY,"Yeah, a decent hotel-room, would it be terribly inconvenient if she stayed at my place.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 121,GEORGE,"You cant be serious. This is New York city. There must be eleven million decent hotel rooms! Whatta you need? A flag? (waving his handkerchief) This is the signal, Jerry, this is the signal!",1.0,S01E01,1.0 122,JERRY,"(cynical) This is the signal? Thank you, Mr. Signal. Where were you yesterday?",1.0,S01E01,1.0 123,GEORGE,I think I was affected by the caffeine.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 124,GEORGE,"Ho, ho, ho, good dog, good dog...",1.0,S01E01,1.0 125,KESSLER,"Hey, he really likes you, George.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 126,GEORGE,"Well, thats flattering.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 127,KESSLER,"Oh, hes gettin a drink of water. (pointing to the mattress) Is this for that girl?",1.0,S01E01,1.0 128,JERRY,Yeah.,1.0,S01E01,1.0
